parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.58</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets tooltip for item with given index of the listbox or combobox with id idc of the topmost user dialog to the given data.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetTooltip''' [idc, index, tooltip] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index, tooltip]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetTooltip''' [index, tooltip] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [index, tooltip]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> tooltip: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetTooltip]] [101, 1, "tooltip"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetTooltip]] [0, "another tooltip"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lnbSetTooltip]], [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 9, 2017 - 13:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
[ Arma 3 v1.75.142535 ] if you want to put linebreaks into a tooltip, use this method: <br>
<code>format [ "%1,%2%3", "hi", parseText "\n", "my name is Will" ]</code>
</dd>
